1.content:
I peer down at you in your little box with a smirk on my face. As you glanced up to see who it was that shrank you, you gasped and recognized me. I had been your bully ever since you started your high school years. I was also a freshman at the time, but already was popular with a lot of friends due to me being on the football team. My name is Jason, and YOU'VE just become my new 5-inch toy to play with.

"Ah, I see you're already awake!" My voice boomed down to you. "Wonderful, I thought for sure you'd be out for a little while longer, but I guess I was wrong!" I chuckled softly before continuing to speak. "That means the fun can already begin!"

You watched in horror as my hand reached down to grab your tiny body, my fingers wrapping perfectly around it, leaving only your head and your feet visible. I brought you up to my face, to examine you before parting my lips to speak.

"If only you knew what I had planned for you." My hot breath washing over your face. "And you're NOT going to enjoy it!"

You could only squirm in my grasp and wonder what I had planned, and it won't be long before you find out what it is.



NOTE: Remember to add only ONE option choice per chapter, and write at least a simple paragraph, or how much I wrote each time. Absolutely NO one-line replies. They will be deleted each time.
1.title: My plan was a success!

11.content:
I looked up from the vice grip you had gripped me with, only to see a cruel smirk on your face. It was then that I knew this was no accident, and that you were indeed the one that shrunk me. I had always tried to make myself meek, to stay out of the spotlight until I graduated but unfortunately, you had your sights locked on me from the first day. At first, it was small things. Calling me names and throwing things at me. Then, you started physically beating me, despite my protests.

I had thought that was the worst of it but unfortunately, it seems you had one more trick up your sleeve. I struggled in your grip with all my effort, but your fingers didn't even budge, giving the impression of a straight jacket. Soon enough, I ran out of energy, exhausting all hopes of escaping before you did something unimaginable. I once again looked up to an amused face, and could only wait for the terrible things you would do to me.
11.title: Fearful Realization.

111.content:
Feeling you squirm within my grip, I could only chuckle at your pathetic attempt to escape. There was no use of tiring yourself out because you're going to need all the energy you got.

"I would save your energy if I were you." I smirked down at you. "Because you're definitely going to need it."

Licking my lips, I reached down and began to pull down my pants and boxers just enough to expose a good portion of my ass crack. I hovered you above it with your face pointing down. "See that? That's your new home where you'll be staying for a long time." I smirk as I slowly began to lower you, this time, though, sliding you into my ass crack feet first. I slide you all the way inside until your head is completely devoured by my crack.

I smirked and pulled the rest of my pants and boxers back up, slapping my left butt cheek. "Hope you enjoy it back there. I know I'll enjoy having you smothered between them!
111.title: Into your new home

1111.content:
As you lowered me to the dark cavern, the smell grew stronger and stronger. It was a smell that very few people liked, the smell of shit. At last, the vice-grip you had on me loosened, only for the source of the smell to be right in front of my face, the only thing I could see with the very limited light. Your anus had brown spots all over it, showing me the reason why it smelt so bad. Your anus was wrinkly, although I couldn't even see that very well. I struggled to escape the smell, but all that got was a chuckle from above, and a fart from below. The fart was terrible, and an omen of what to come.

All I could hope for was that you'd be merciful.
1111.title: The Smelly Pit.

info.description:
PLEASE READ AND FOLLOW ALL OF THE RULES AND GUIDELINES LISTED BELOW BEFORE YOU DECIDE TO WRITE YOUR ADDITION! I DESERVE THE RIGHT TO DELETE ANY AND ALL ADDITIONS THAT VIOLATE THE RULES LISTED BELOW.THANKS IN ADVANCE!

RULES AND GUIDELINES ARE AS FOLLOWS:
-Please be as detailed as you possibly can in each of your replies. Nobody likes to read replies with little to no detail, right? I don't.
-Please write at least a simple, well lengthy paragraph each response. I do NOT want any one-line responses. They will be deleted.
-You can roleplay any gender you want to, rather you're a female, male, shemale, ect. Create your own character(s) and enjoy!
-Please follow the storyline that I've written in the very first chapter. I will delete your addition if you reply with a totally different story.
-Please be sure to use proper spelling and grammar. Use the 'spell check' option before submitting your newest addition!
-Write your responses in 1st-person action. (EX: I smirked as I began to lower my bare foot down upon your body).
-Only add one option choice each response, so it'll only go in ONE direction! Again... DO NOT ADD MULTIPLE CHOICES!!
-Death may happen at some point, but you're mostly pliable and able to withstand a lot of abuse once you're shrunk!
-You can create up to at least two(2) different characters and storylines. Save room for other people who may want to join!
-Do NOT control my characters actions. That's MY job. You control your own characters actions!

If you contribute to this one, please feel free to contribute to my other one, where the roles are switched, where you shrank me! Thanks!

NOTE: This roleplay interactive isn't for the faint of heart. You WILL be put through humiliating and gross scenarios! Enter at your own risk! You will be squashed between my ass cheeks, ball sac, feet, chewed on like gum, swallowed alive, used as living toilet paper, farted on, and so much more than that. You've been warned.
info.pretty_title: The Day YOU Were Shrunk by ME
